thread.title: Facebook launches initiative to promote coding among US minorities
thread.title_full: Facebook launches initiative to promote coding among US minorities

title: Facebook launches initiative to promote coding among US minorities
text:
Facebook launches initiative to promote coding among US minorities 
Times Of India Thursday 22nd October, 2015 
Aimed at women, students and parents, Facebook's TechPrep aims to analogize coding skills with language skills to make the subject of computer science less forbidding and opaque....
